name: ReBo
description:
ReBo is a simple Figma utility allowing you to precisely place, and organize guides to your frames!


 Features Include...

✨ Easily add mirrored margin bounds to your frames

✨ Create Columns for a quick column (or row) grid

✨ Save your guides for use later

✨ Quick-guide shortcuts to add center margins

✨ Multi-frame guides clear

✨ KeyCombo! Control + Shift + S to save your current guides


Adding guides

By default, your margins are locked, meaning anything you input on a "Left" margin, will mirror the "Right" side. Same is true for Rows with "Top" & "Bottom". Once you've entered your desired values, Make sure you have a Frame selected, then hit Add Guides. That's it!


You can also add columns, and it will respect margins you have placed, if any.


Saving guides

If adding these settings (columns and margins) are part of your normal workflow, you can save these settings by click the ▴ on the bottom right corner or press Control+ Shift + S to bring up the Save Dialog. Give your guides a name, and bam! it should now appear under Saved Guides.
